revisionDesc.tei:change: Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.
revisionDesc.change: Added listPerson with persons mentioned in file:/BachUni/BachBibliothek/GitHub/OpenArabicPE/authority-files/data/tei/bibliography_OpenArabicPE-periodicals.TEIP5.xml but not previously present in this master file.
Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.
Improved persName, surname and forename nodes by automatically marking up Arabic name components, such as nasab, nisba, khitab, kunya.
Improved persName, surname and forename nodes by automatically marking up Arabic name components, such as nasab, nisba, khitab, kunya.
Corrected validation errors. The file still contains duplicate names
Improved person nodes that had references to VIAF, by querying VIAF and adding birth , death , and idno .
Added the list of authors, who published journal articles between 1870 and 1920 and who were recorded by archive.sakhrit.co
